pages.title: Forge Fluid Port
pages.text: The Forge Fluid Port allows you to insert or extract fluids from a Turbine.$(br2)This Port accept and emit vanilla fluids but only if they are valid $(l:bigreactors:misc/coolantsystem)coolants or vapors$(/l).$(br2)A $(l:bigreactors:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to change the Port from input to output mode.

$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no$(br)$(l)Wrench:$() a $(l:bigreactors:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to toggle the Port mode
